Submodules

anysection.utils.globals module

class anysection.utils.globals.Globals[source]

Bases: object

This class contains global constants used throughout the AnySection library.

D_TOL = 1e-05

EXP_START_NE = 5
EXP_START_NU = 5

INF = inf

NEG_INF = -inf
N_TOL = 1e-05
PI = 3.141592653589793

ZERO = 1e-06
static clamp(value, min_value, max_value)[source]

Clamp a value between a minimum and maximum.

Parameters:

  • value (float) – The value to clamp.

  • min_value (float) – Minimum allowed value.

  • max_value (float) – Maximum allowed value.

Returns:

Clamped value.

Return type:

float

static is_close(a, b, tol=1e-06)[source]

Check if two values are approximately equal within a specified tolerance.

Parameters:

  • a (float) – First value.

  • b (float) – Second value.

  • tol (float) – Tolerance.

Returns:

True if values are close, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
